#include<iostream>
#include<climits>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
	int n,q,t;
	int min=INT_MAX,max=INT_MIN;
	cin>>n>>q;
	int *a=new int[n];
	
	for(int i=0;i<n;i++)
	{
		cin>>a[i];
		if(a[i] < min)
			min = a[i];
		if(a[i] > max)
			max = a[i];
	}
	
	while(q--)
	{
		cin>>t;
		if(n==1)
		{
			if(t==a[0])
				cout<<"yes"<<endl;
			else
				cout<<"No"<<endl;
		}
		else
		{
			if(t>=min && t<=max)
				cout<<"Yes"<<endl;
			else
				cout<<"No"<<endl;			
		}
	}
}
